title: VS Code extension (moe-vscode)
description:
Create VS Code extension equivalent to the JetBrains plugin.

**Features (MVP):**
- Sidebar panel with task board (kanban columns)
- Task cards with drag-and-drop status changes
- Task detail view with approve/reject actions
- Connection status indicator
- WebSocket connection to moe-daemon
- Settings for daemon connection

**Architecture:**
- Use VS Code Webview for board UI
- TypeScript extension
- Reuse board styling from JetBrains plugin
definitionOfDone: Extension activates and connects to daemon
Can change task status via drag-drop
taskRails: Use VS Code extension best practices
